heading: samsung enters mp3 fray
subheading: samsung plans to enter the mp3 market with "yepp." the new digital player is slated to debut in september, but rio port makers seem unconcerned.
author: katie dean
text: yepp, samsung has entered the mp3 fray all right, but its chief competition isn't exactly shaking with fear. samsung's new player, the yp-e32 (or yepp), can download and play digital music, and has a built-in voice recorder that can store up to 128 minutes of voice notes. mobile users will be able to store and transfer pc data on the yepp.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
